Posts.Content: Hi Britt - I'm sorry for your mom's recent diagnosis and I know how frightening this can be. I'm enclosing a link to a web page of personal breast cancer stories, as I know it includes suggestions of how family can support the person diagnosed. Many of the stories are inspirational and hopfully the titles will indicate which ones you would want to read. I wish you and your family the best! http://www.navigatingcancer.com/cancer/breast/experiences
Posts.Title: Mom was just diagnosed with Stage IV Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Navigating Cancer has a new blog directory which includes breast cancer blogs. If you like to follow blogs or if you have a blog of your own that you want to add to the directory you can do so. http://www.navigatingcancer.com/cancer_blogs
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Bloggers
